title: Welcome to the next Renaissance
description: The full-time freelance reporter who makes a living off of bylines alone has long been dead, but I regret to inform you of the passing of the full-time journalist as well. For so many of us, the option of making a living purely through journalism — whether reporting, editing, copyediting, or even working in journalism...
content: The full-time freelance reporter who makes a living off of bylines alone has long been dead, but I regret to inform you of the passing of the full-time journalist as well. For so many of us, the option of making a living purely through journalism — whether reporting, editing, copyediting, or even working in journalism...
